w:r.w:t: Designed and developed a blockchain-based decentralized medical ecosystem ensuring patient data privacy, immutability, and transparent interactions between patients and healthcare providers.
Integrated IPFS for encrypted storage and seamless transfer of medical records, ensuring patient files
are directly accessible to authorized doctors while maintaining confidentiality.
Implemented smart contracts to enable secure appointment booking and
automated payment handling using cryptocurrency, eliminating intermediaries and reducing transaction overhead by 20%.
React.js, Express.js, MongoDB Atlas, REST APIs
Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform for handcrafted products using the MERN stack, featuring a fully responsive and visually rich UI with mo
Built a secure backend APIs for product management, user subscription handling,
and content retrieval, improving data accessibility and reducing response latency by 30%.
Integrated reusable React components, client-side form validation, and UX-optimized layouts to improve frontend maintainability and deliver a consistent cross-device experience.
Built an interactive desktop voice assistant capable of
executing real-time commands including web search,
playback, joke generation, and motivational quotes delivery.
Integrated speech recognition and TTS using
and pyttsx3, achieving 90% command recognition accuracy in quiet environments.
Designed multiple utility modules such as music playbook, reminders, quote logging, and command rep
etition, resulting in feature-rich AI assistant.
focused on building end-to-end web applications using modern full-stack technologies, with emphasis on ReactJS for front-end development.
in developing responsive user interfaces, implementing component-based architecture, and managing state using hooks and best practices.
integration concepts, API consumption, and real-time data handling to create dynamic and scalable web features.
